metadata.title: CORRUPTED HANDOFF DOCUMENT - JSON STRUCTURAL ISSUES
metadata.created_by: Claude Sonnet 4 - kOS Project Continuity Specialist
metadata.purpose: Archive corrupted handoff document with JSON structural issues for reference

issues_found: DUPLICATED_CONTENT - Entire document duplicated multiple times
MALFORMED_JSON - Multiple JSON objects nested incorrectly
BROKEN_STRUCTURE - Lines 717-719 show syntax errors with missing commas
INVALID_FORMAT - File contains 2,029 lines when it should be ~700 lines
CORRUPTED_DATA - Critical information buried in malformed structure

original_content: The original corrupted handoff document contained valuable information but was unusable due to JSON structural issues. This has been archived for reference and a clean version has been created.
